Instruction: Prepare the fava beans as described in Recipe 1.
In a large bowl, combine the fava beans, halved cherry tomatoes,  chopped red onion,  and chopped parsley.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil and red wine vinegar to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to coat evenly.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Let the salad marinate for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow the flavors to meld.
Serve chilled or at room temperature as a vibrant and nutritious side dish.
